title: can riot help me to unlock my account to paly game
body: i have 3 year not play that game   and wana back in few day . but i see my account is permant  locked

replies.body: We can look into this for you and find some options!  Reach out to us through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and our account team can review your quest.  We'll get back to you as soon as we can!
